gov.va.med.srcalc.vista.vistalink

Class VistaLinkUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.srcalc.vista.vistalink.VistaLinkUtil

  • public class VistaLinkUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides VistALink utility methods. These are not srcalc-specific: VistALink could have provided them itself.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String plaintext)
      Obfuscates the given plaintext like VistaKernelHash, but with a friendlier API.
      static com.google.common.base.Optional<java.lang.String> getJndiNameForDivision(java.lang.String division)
      Returns the JNDI name of the VistALink ConnectionFactory for the given division, if known.
      static boolean isDivisionKnown(java.lang.String division)
      Returns true if the given division is known to VistALink, false otherwise.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getJndiNameForDivision

        public static com.google.common.base.Optional<java.lang.String> getJndiNameForDivision(java.lang.String division)
        Returns the JNDI name of the VistALink ConnectionFactory for the given division, if known.

      • isDivisionKnown

        public static boolean isDivisionKnown(java.lang.String division)
        Returns true if the given division is known to VistALink, false otherwise.

      • encrypt

        public static java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String plaintext)
        Obfuscates the given plaintext like VistaKernelHash, but with a friendlier API. Does not avoid CDATA boundaries and will not throw VistaKernelHashCountLimitExceededException.
        Parameters:
        plaintext - the text to obfuscate
        Returns:
        the obfuscated text
